Traits poison, incapacitation, sleep

Saving Throw Fortitude

Further exposure to lethargy poison does not require the target to attempt additional saving throws; only failing an saving throw against an ongoing exposure can progress its stage.

Maximum Duration 4 Hours

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed1} (1 minute)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious} with no Perception check to wake up (1 round)

Stage 4 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious} with no Perception check to wake up ([[/br 1d4 #duration Lethargy Poison]] hours)
